title: Day One [videogame trailer]
brief_description: Winner in the Middle Videogame. In 2017, tens of thousands of Australians will battle the greatest mystery of their lives … high school. In ‘Day One’, your mission is to survive your first day of high school. You will need to find your seat in assembly, learn a new instrument, escape detention, sprint 100 metres, destroy a vending machine, and dodge rubbish bins to ultimately find your classroom.
